nodes.excerpt: Donut for Hybrid Work helps teams build relationships, equitably access opportunities for growth and facetime, and have fun together in a hybrid world. Release includes Favorite Things feature, new hybrid-friendly templates, and Watercooler in shared channels.

nodes.excerpt: Orbital is your always-ready, zero-friction, super-interactive, fun-to-customise, never-seen-anything-like-it-before place to gather. Pop in for meetings, quick chats, open-door office hours, or cowork together through the day â€“ all at the same link.

nodes.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
nodes.title: Pickle - Transcribe and analyze phone and video conversations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
nodes.title: Covalent - Interactive icebreakers for remote teams
nodes.author: Arek Der-Sarkissian

nodes.excerpt: http://www.crikle.com is a web-based sales solution that combines video calling with customised sales guidance and actionable information capture, to sell quickly. Less admin, more sales. Everything your team needs to convert more customers, faster.
nodes.title: Crikle - Sell more from anywhere
nodes.author: Guillermo Bresciano

nodes.excerpt: Rollcall makes it easy to organize remote meetings with people in any timezone. Add to Slack, create an agenda, schedule a timeframe and the Rollcall bot collects your standup in text, audio-only, screen share and video formats.
nodes.title: Rollcall - Asynchronous standup meetings in Slack.
nodes.author: Mike McMillan

nodes.excerpt: The Chief of Staff Network is a private community connecting Chiefs of Staff from the fastest growing startups and enterprises. Our community meets in a trusted environment to learn from one another, exchange ideas and reach their full potential as leaders.
nodes.title: Chief of Staff Network - Community for Chiefs of Staff to accelerate their careers.
nodes.author: Scott Amenta

nodes.excerpt: Teamflow is a virtual office for your team to hang out. Bring back the camaraderie of being in the office, the energy of working in the same room, the spontaneity of hallway conversations. â € The joy of feeling like a team again.
nodes.title: Teamflow - Feel like a team again with your own virtual office
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: RHTRH is an open source Chrome extension that raises your (virtual) hand on Google Meet when you raise your (physical) hand. RHTRH works with on any Chromium browsers for all organisations using Google Workspace.
nodes.title: Raise Hand To Raise Hand - Raise your hand in real life to raise your hand on Meet
nodes.author: Lorenzo Signoretti

nodes.excerpt: Most scheduling tools put the burden on the recipient. SavvyCal makes it easy for both parties to find the best time to meetâ€”in an instant.
nodes.title: SavvyCal - Sending your scheduling link shouldn't feel weird.
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Mindful video conferencing enhancements for increased productivity and digital wellbeing. Agenda display, guest info, graceful entries/exits, emoji & GIF sharing with an inspiring & fun interface.
nodes.title: Mindfulmeets (for Google Meet) - Add emojis/GIFs, agendas, guest info & more to Google Meet
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: Does a bad backdrop mean your video calls, virtual dates and zoom meetings are letting the team down? Is your virtual backdrop failing to impress? The Work-From-Home Backdrop installs in seconds and instantly transforms your space into a dynamic domain.
nodes.title: The Work From Home Backdrop - Physical backdrop for video calls and Zoom meetings
nodes.author: Samuel alex

nodes.excerpt: Join a curated network of rising stars who want to build the next big thing as founders or executives. Accelerate your career with access to ambitious peers, mentorship, events, courses, and much more.
nodes.title: Propel - The community for builders
nodes.author: Tom Guthrie
